headline: Is It Too Late to Invest in Paramount Skydance After Its 48% Rally in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Paramount Skydance is still a bargain, or if you've already missed the best of its run? You're in the right place to dig into what really drives its value. Shares have soared 48.2% year-to-date and are up 46.9% over the past year, with short-term shifts of 3.8% in the last week but a -6.5% dip over 30 days. One of the biggest stories surrounding the stock has been the growing excitement over its newly announced collaborations with major streaming platforms, which added fuel to...
